name: NOCacheAdminca
author: ATs.M и Владимир @Grom1k

sections.description:
Плагин НЕКЭширования админки WordPress – перед глазами ТОЛЬКО ОБНОВЛЁННАЯ СТРАНИЦА !!
Adds the plugin disables caching in the admin well helps to lose that work in the admin panel and writing articles for the website (useful links in admin bar: working with WordPress 4.8)

Tags

cache, no cache, admin, administration, no-caches administration

4.7.7

Added folder for extensions menu-cnop and files

3.2.5

  • ADD: Russian localization
sections.installation: Important!! when activated, plugin will clean all the cache in the browser and, if so, the caching plugins… – Важно!! при активации плагина почистите весь кэш – в браузере и, если есть, в плагинах кэширования…
sections.faq:
The plugin loads the server?
NO!! the extra load on the server plugin does not create! Code valid – as a consequence easy to use…
